title: Personalized Science Information Package Design and Utilization Course

context.additional_context: For current practitioners requiring enhanced scientific information utilization skills based on field experience. Operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments with project-based assessments to measure learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can establish criteria for selecting personalized science learning content by analyzing individual information needs
Learners identify and share information need patterns of peer practitioners using requirements engineering techniques
Learners apply science information packages to workplace problem-solving by designing effective sequencing
Learners can construct personalized learning materials using smartphone-based information-gathering tools in offline environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
